test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `in-scope-prefixes()`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-InScopePrefixesFunc-1
test-case.description: For a directly constructed element fn:in-scope-prefixes() returns 'xml' and the zero length string for the default element namespace.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K2-InScopePrefixesFunc-2
test-case.description: For a computed element fn:in-scope-prefixes() returns 'xml'.
